title: tinypic photo
body: I played before the patch and all was good... now i can't play (i'm probably getting reported right now). What should i do?

replies.body:
I believe this is a recent issue that's being caused by a custom resolution or setting.  The following should get this fixed up:

> Delete your Config folder. This is typically found at C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
> 


This will get your resolution to default and into game.  Let me know if it helps!
